experiment_metadata.project: Credibly INFO-5900 - Credit Behavior with OCEAN Personality

key_improvements: Eliminated 115,718 sparse dimensions from One-Hot Encoding
Reduced processing time from infinite to 1.25 seconds

conclusion.recommendation: OCEAN personality features did not improve model performance
conclusion.reason: The marginal personality traits extracted from loan descriptions added noise rather than signal
next_steps: Investigate whether OCEAN traits better predict other outcomes (e.g., customer satisfaction, repayment behavior)
Explore deeper NLP features from descriptions
Use OCEAN features in combination with ensemble methods

modeling_data.description: Complete dataset with all 36 original features + 5 OCEAN traits

ocean_ground_truth.description: Ground truth OCEAN personality scores for 500 balanced samples

ocean_weights.description: Ridge regression weights for mapping features to OCEAN traits

evaluation_results.content: Confusion matrix, ROC curve, and metrics for baseline model
Confusion matrix, ROC curve, and metrics for OCEAN-enhanced model
Detailed performance metrics comparison between baseline and OCEAN models

feature_analysis.description: Feature importance rankings for baseline model
Feature importance rankings for OCEAN-enhanced model

trained_models.type: Ridge Regression (5 models for 5 OCEAN traits)

preprocessors.description: ColumnTransformer for baseline model (numeric scaling + categorical encoding)
ColumnTransformer for OCEAN model (numeric scaling + categorical encoding)

preprocessing_optimization.impact: Reduced preprocessing time from impossible to 1.25 seconds
preprocessing_optimization.reproducibility: Preprocessing optimizations ensure model is production-ready

model_performance.interpretation: OCEAN features did not enhance predictive power
model_performance.data_quality: High specificity (99.6%) but low recall (1.6%) - imbalanced dataset challenge

ocean_extraction.method: LLM-based personality inference from loan descriptions
ocean_extraction.reliability: Moderate - LLM interpretation of personality from limited text

notes: This summary represents the final, unified results from the October 22, 2024 experimental run. All outdated notebook runs and intermediate results have been archived.
